Binance API Keys

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning="Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials." %}

1 Create a Binance Account

Sign up for a Binance account if you don't have one. Sign up here.

2 Access API Management

  1. Log in to your Binance account
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner
  3. Select "API Management" from the dropdown menu

3 Create API Key

  1. Click "Create API"
  2. Choose "System generated"
  3. Give your API key a descriptive name.

4 Configure Security Settings

  1. Enable "Restrict access to trusted IPs only"
  2. Add the server's IP address: {{server_ip}}

5 Set Trading Permissions

Enable the following permissions based on your needs:

  • Spot & Margin Trading
  • Futures Trading

IMPORTANT: Make sure to copy your secret key before clicking save.

{% comment %}

6 Complete Integration

Copy your API credentials and paste them in the add Binance form.
